name: magnify
description: Toggles zooming of viewport or sets a specific scaling factor.

commands.name: zoom
commands.short_description: zooms to "factor" or toggles zoom level if factor is omitted.
commands.full_description:
[factor] zooms to "factor" or toggles zoom level if factor is omitted.

If factor is omitted, it toggles between the configured zoom level and no zoom.
Factor can be relative (e.g. +0.5 or -0.5).

config.name: duration
config.description: Animation duration in frames (0 to disable)
